roleset.name: to subject (a person or group) to a propaganda
roleset.note: PROPAGANDIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'propagandize' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from propagandize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The theory was that the Voice is a propaganda agency and this government should n't propagandize its own people .
